posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Toronto is one of the tougher N172 team variations and Foutz is a popular player with a popular team and highly graded. 

Want to trade for Charlie Bastian, Tom Burns, Mike Griffin (arms folded or batting), Frank Hankinson, William Hoover, Michael Hughes, John Kelly, Kid Madden (arms folded, bat next to rock), Jim McGarr (with umpire), Charlie Reipschlager, Taylor Shaffer, George Shoch (with umpire), Lee Viau, James White, Ed Williamson & mascot

or

any Old Judge players from the following teams:

Burlington, Hartford, Jersey City, Mansfield, New Haven or Worcester

Thanks,
Kevin

kkkkandp@aol.com

[IMG]http://members.aol.com/kkkkandp/foutz.jpg[/IMG]
